comments:
add a breakpoint to a cu
debug to the breakpoint (so the breakpoint is installed)
close the project that contains the cu
exit the workspace
start the workspace
open the project

The breakpoint is missing

Exit the workspace
start the workspace

The breakpoint is back

This is the "workspace locked" problem. There will be a trace in the log 
indicating that we are trying to modify a marker while the tree is locked. The 
breakpoint (marker) is installed when the project is closed, and we try to re-
set the attribute when it is opened, and fail.
